articles.author: Jake Polden
articles.title: World's most valuable clubs: Man Utd drop out top three as Liverpool climb and Arsenal fall - Mirror Online
articles.description: European champions Bayern Munich have moved above Ole Gunnar Solskjaer's Manchester United, who have slipped down to fourth place despite being valued at £3.05billion
articles.content:
Manchester United have fallen outside of the top three richest clubs in the world while Liverpool have climbed three places, according to Forbes. 
European champions Bayern Munich have moved above O… [+1899 chars]

articles.title: AstraZeneca jab to be recommended to be restricted to over-60s in vaccine blow for Ireland - Irish Mirror
articles.description: A European Medicines Agency (EMA) investigation of blood clots in the brain reported by some people has prompted some European countries to change their recommendations
articles.content:
Ireland's National Immunisation Advisory Committee (NIAC) is expected to recommend that AstraZeneca's Covid-19 vaccine be restricted for use for people over the age of 60.

articles.content:
